name: R5-VerificationResult-R4-VerificationResult
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 VerificationResult into FHIR R4

element.display: Describes validation requirements, source(s), status and dates for one or more elements

target.display: Describes validation requirements, source(s), status and dates for one or more elements
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult`

element.display: Information about the entity attesting to information

target.display: Information about the entity attesting to information
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation`

element.display: The method by which attested information was submitted/retrieved

target.display: The method by which attested information was submitted/retrieved
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.communicationMethod` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.communicationMethod`

element.display: The date the information was attested to

target.display: The date the information was attested to
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.date`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: When the who is asserting on behalf of another (organization or individual)

target.display: When the who is asserting on behalf of another (organization or individual)
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.onBehalfOf` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.onBehalfOf`

element.display: A digital identity certificate associated with the proxy entity submitting attested information on behalf of the attestation source

target.display: A digital identity certificate associated with the proxy entity submitting attested information on behalf of the attestation source
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.proxyIdentityCertificate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.proxyIdentityCertificate`

element.display: Proxy signature (digital or image)

target.display: Proxy signature
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.proxySignature` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.proxySignature` - proxySignature has change due to type change: R5 `proxySignature` `Signature` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `proxySignature`

element.display: A digital identity certificate associated with the attestation source

target.display: A digital identity certificate associated with the attestation source
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.sourceIdentityCertificate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.sourceIdentityCertificate`

element.display: Attester signature (digital or image)

target.display: Attester signature
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.sourceSignature` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.sourceSignature` - sourceSignature has change due to type change: R5 `sourceSignature` `Signature` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `sourceSignature`

element.display: The individual or organization attesting to information

target.display: The individual or organization attesting to information
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.attestation.who` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.attestation.who`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: fatal | warn | rec-only | none

target.display: fatal | warn | rec-only | none
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.failureAction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.failureAction`

element.display: Frequency of revalidation

target.display: Frequency of revalidation
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.frequency` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.frequency`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: The date/time validation was last completed (including failed validations)

target.display: The date/time validation was last completed (including failed validations)
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.lastPerformed` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.lastPerformed`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: none | initial | periodic

target.display: none | initial | periodic
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.need` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.need`

element.display: The date when target is next validated, if appropriate

target.display: The date when target is next validated, if appropriate
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.nextScheduled` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.nextScheduled`

target.display: Information about the primary source(s) involved in validation
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource`

element.display: yes | no | undetermined

target.display: yes | no | undetermined
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.canPushUpdates` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.canPushUpdates`

target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.communicationMethod` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.communicationMethod`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.id`

target.display: specific | any | source
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.pushTypeAvailable` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.pushTypeAvailable`

element.display: Type of primary source (License Board; Primary Education; Continuing Education; Postal Service; Relationship owner; Registration Authority; legal source; issuing source; authoritative source)

target.display: Type of primary source (License Board; Primary Education; Continuing Education; Postal Service; Relationship owner; Registration Authority; legal source; issuing source; authoritative source)
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.type`

element.display: When the target was validated against the primary source

target.display: When the target was validated against the primary source
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.validationDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.validationDate`

element.display: successful | failed | unknown

target.display: successful | failed | unknown
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.validationStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.validationStatus`

element.display: Reference to the primary source

target.display: Reference to the primary source
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.primarySource.who` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.primarySource.who`

element.display: attested | validated | in-process | req-revalid | val-fail | reval-fail | entered-in-error

target.display: attested | validated | in-process | req-revalid | val-fail | reval-fail
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/verificationresult-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/verificationresult-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: When the validation status was updated

target.display: When the validation status was updated
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.statusDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.statusDate`

element.display: A resource that was validated

target.display: A resource that was validated
target.comment: R5 `VerificationResult.target` maps as Equivalent to R4 `VerificationResult.target`
